General.Name: Wejo Group Limited Warrant
General.Description: Wejo Group Limited develops data marketplace and software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions. It offers traffic management of the data marketplace and SaaS solutions. Its data exchange platform sources data directly from connected vehicles, using a range of sensors inside the vehicle integrated by the OEMs to ascertain vehicle status, vehicle health, dynamics, and location. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Manchester, United Kingdom.
General.Address: ABC Building, Manchester, United Kingdom, M3 4AE
